subject: Re: sound soap sweep manipulation
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi Bruce.  I just go back and forth randomly.  I have noticed that sometimes if I go all the 
way to one end or the other, it will lock up on me and I have to stop the session, close the 
window, reopen and begin again.  But that might be unique to my computer.  I know they 
all have their little quirks.  

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Steve,
> 
> How where you manipulating the slide bar in sound soap?
> 
> Was it progressive fom on end to the other, Was it jumping around 
> randomly?
> Please explain, I want to test it out tomorrow. FYI jeffersons terms 
> where 1801 to 1809.
> 
> Bruce
>
